text: Giacomo Furia (2 January 1925 - 5 June 2015) was an Italian actor. He appeared in over 130 movies between 1948 and 1998. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from Campania Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian screenwriters Category:Italian television actors Category:Writers from Campania
title: Giacomo Furia
